name: tempSensor.F
content:
Converts tempSensor.value to an easy to read temperature in Fahrenheit.

[`tempSensor.F`(#f78183)](/docs/applab/tempSensor.F/) is a property of the tempSensor analog object. [`tempSensor.F`(#f78183)](/docs/applab/tempSensor.F/) converts the raw value to Fahrenheit.
short_description: Converts tempSensor.value to an easy to read temperature in Fahrenheit.
